title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.5 - Storage and removal of waste material and unfit foods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.5 - Storage and removal of waste material and unfit foods

State Regulations
(a) Waste material shall be stored in such a
manner as not to become a nuisance, preferably in a separate building. Covered
containers shall be used and frequent removal from the premises shall be the
rule. (b) All unfit foods shall be
removed from food salvage plants often enough as to not become a nuisance. This
removal shall be done only by a method approved by the commissioner and all
disposal costs shall be borne by the salvager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
256.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
